entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
